reviewText:
Who ever transfered this movie had no idea what they were doing. The entire movie is cropped horribly. During the opening credits the AT in ATTACK and TS in ROBOTS is cut completely off the screen. Not to mention the actors names, which are totally ineligible.

I only bought this because it was the only way for me to see Lemmy Caution movies.
I would never buy from this manufacturer again because I would be all the other films are poorly transfered just like this one.

Truly a shame !
